forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny skies. Becoming windy late. High 11C. Winds NNW at 30 to 50 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Sunny skies. Becoming windy late. High 53F. Winds NNW at 20 to 30 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 3C. N winds at 25 to 40 km/h, decreasing to 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. Low 38F. N winds at 15 to 25 mph, decreasing to 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the morning will evolve into a more steady rain in the afternoon. High 51F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. Low 6C. Winds S at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Low 43F. Winds S at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 9C. Winds WSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 47F. Winds WSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 3C. Winds SW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 37F. Winds SW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Occasional rain. High 7C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near 6mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High around 45F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early with thunderstorms developing late. Low 3C. ESE winds shifting to WSW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Light rain early with thunderstorms developing late. Low 37F. ESE winds shifting to WSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Scattered thunderstorms in the morning. Partly cloudy skies late. High 9C. Winds NW at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy skies with scattered thunderstorms in the morning. High 49F. Winds NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Clear. Low 1C. Winds ENE at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear skies. Low 33F. Winds ENE at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 52F. Winds WSW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 2C. Winds light and variable.
forecastday.fcttext: Clear to partly cloudy. Low 36F. Winds light and variable.

forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies during the morning hours will give way to occasional showers in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds NE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 40%.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy in the morning. Increasing clouds with periods of showers later in the day. High near 55F. ESE winds shifting to NW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 40%.
